backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the BizForge AI backend with six query functions (generateBrandNames, generateLogoConcept, generateMarketingContent, analyzeSentiment, generateColorPalette, askChatbot) that return hardcoded stub data along with their associated types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the Logo Concept Generator form contains a gold-styled 'Generate Logo Concept' submit button that triggers logo generation and a 10-variant showcase, mapped to test ID REQ-15.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and contents of each component, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart colors, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the BizForge AI Vite/React app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing active tool state and rendering AppLayout with a ToolView switcher that maps ToolId values to the six tool components.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout shell composing the Sidebar, a hero header with background image and BizForge AI badge, a scrollable main content area, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive sidebar navigation listing all six AI tools with icons, active gold highlighting, mobile overlay toggle, and an AI engine status indicator in the footer.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandingCh: A chat interface component that lets users ask branding and marketing questions, with support for speech recognition input, suggested questions, and displays AI responses with structured metadata.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandNameG: Brand Name Generator tool with Industry, Keywords, and Tone form inputs that calls the generateBrandNames backend mutation and displays up to 15 results in a copyable numbered grid.
frontend/src/components/tools/ColorPalet: A form-based tool that generates brand color palettes by accepting industry and tone inputs, displaying results as copyable color swatches with labels and emotional meanings.
frontend/src/components/tools/LogoConcep: A logo concept generator that takes brand name, industry, and tone inputs, then renders 10 SVG logo style variants with individual PNG download support.
frontend/src/components/tools/MarketingC: A marketing copy generator that accepts brand details and target audience, then displays generated content blocks (social captions, ads, copy) with clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/tools/SentimentA: A sentiment analysis tool that classifies pasted customer reviews as positive, negative, or neutral, displaying results with color-coded badges, icons, and confidence bars.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, returning an anonymous actor when unauthenticated and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogoRenderer.ts: Defines logo rendering variants (wordmark, lettermark, emblem, icon-wordmark) that generate SVG React elements from a LogoConcept and brand name.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query mutation hooks that wrap backend actor calls for brand name generation, logo concepts, marketing content, sentiment analysis, color palettes, and chatbot queries.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript state, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind layers, and defines dark-first CSS custom properties for a gold-accented design system including animations and scrollbar utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom fonts, oklch-based color tokens (including gold variants), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations, with typography and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the BizForge AI project state (version 15), listing existing features, architectural notes, and known issues including a broken logo showcase that needs rebuilding.
